comment: " The interaction reflects three years of mounting frustration with an overtly partisan media , exemplified by CNN , which has dropped any pretense of fairness and become an organ of the Democratic Party . " <URL>
amr:

      :ARG2 (f / frustrate-01
            :ARG0 (m / media
                  :mod (p / partisan
                        :mod (o / overt)))
            :ARG1-of (m2 / mount-02)
            :ARG1-of (e / exemplify-01
                  :ARG0 (p2 / publication
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "CNN")
                        :ARG0-of (d / drop-05
                              :ARG1 (p3 / pretend-01
                                    :ARG0 p2
                                    :ARG1 (f2 / fairness)
                                    :mod (a / any)))
                        :ARG0-of (b / become-01
                              :ARG2 (o2 / organ
                                    :part-of (p4 / political-party
                                          :name (n2 / name
                                                :op1 "Democratic"
                                                :op2 "Party"))))
                        :ARG1-of b))
            :duration (t / temporal-quantity
                  :quant 3
                  :unit (y / year))))
